titles: May 24, 1649. A true representation of the present sad and lamentable condition of the county of Lancaster, and particularly of the towns of Wigan Ashton and the parts adjacent.
notes: Signed by four ministers and baliffs of the town of Wigan, and four ministers of Lancaster.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
